nodes.text: So what's new with you today?
I've been working on a new song:

Shawn - You are so hot
I tried to hide it but now I am caught
You make me realize that the reason that I drool
Is that you're so cool.

You're such a foxy guy
My Eirish Rover with an alibi.
That's how I know that you're the one -
You're so much fun.

And when you say, "What's new with you today?"
I find that you take my breath away.
You turn my whole world into disarray
But that is okay.

You're just like a star shining in the night sky,
You make me feel as if I sprouted wings and could fly.

You got the touch of magic that will make me sigh
So let me love you, and be true
And then go through with it.
What do you think?
Do I truly make you drool for my hot bod?
That was a super sexy song, Aeolus. Just what is it that you want me to go through with it?
<blush>

Man, That song is great.
It makes it clear that you and I should date.
I can't help thinking that I really could relate -
You are my soul mate.
I could debate, but that is clearly checkmate. <grin>
I've been working on my latest song:

Esme, Today
You looked at me and took my breath away
What can I say?

And so, I know
All I want is a chance to be your beau.
My love will grow.

I just want to say that I need you
And that my heart is true.
I hope you'll love me too.

So I'll try to see if you like me
As I do with you.
I love you.
You think Esme will like it?
I'm sure that Esme will think your song is really romantic.
<grin>
I think the world has had enough of silly love songs.
<sigh>
I look around me and I see it isn't so.
I've got a lot I've got to do before the final comes three days from now. I really need to get started on it, but I'm too tired to concentrate on it now.
If you are so worried about the Finals, why don't you get started on them sooner?
I'll get around to studying tomorrow. What about you - don't you need to study?

My exams are easier than yours - I practice my skills in the afternoon and evenings. No one expects me to be the best in my class. You, on the other hand, will undoubtedly be the Best Bard of the Year.
You think I have a chance? I guess I really should study some of the lessons tonight then.
<sigh> I'm not that good. I guess I need to try harder.
I learn things as I go along so that I don't have to cram for exams. The price of putting off for tomorrow what can be done today is the pressure building up from the weight of all that guilt.
<sigh>

Why study? I get by with my natural charm and grace. If you think what you do in a classroom matters in the real world, just wait until you graduate. Then you'll really find out how useful all that studying has been.
<sigh>
If I stole your heart and you stole mine, wouldn't it be the perfect crime?

You've earned a Bachelor of Arts in the Game of Hearts.
You are a very smooth criminal.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: How about cleaning up this room before the school year ends?
I'll put it on my list of things to do.
It's only a few days more before I have to start packing up to go home, so don't sweat the mess.
Sweet Dreams, Aeolus.
Whenever I want you, all I have to do is dream.
Get some rest.
<yawn> I need all the beauty sleep I can get.
